full_text: 04-03-05 #12 TIME 8:31 PM IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffrey Luc DATE 4/05/05 M of COMPOINT communications INC PHONE/MOBILE 646 286 7000 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE Please call him back as soon as possible. It's very important. Haley or scheduler with him at 10 am Friday Jeffrey E. Epstein
